mema 75 denage chaya rupa mahanuwara,galla,mathara,anuradhapura,rathnapura,ampara,migamuwa,puththalama yana polis sthana wala sanduda dinaye sita prasiddhiyata path karana bawath,mema widiyo sandaha nodanuwathwa ho balahathkarayen sambandhawi sitinam ee pilibanda langama polis sthanayata danum di nithimaya washayen sahanayak laba ganimata haki bawada polis lama ha kantha karyanshaya wadiduratath kiya sitiyi.
ema nirmanaya kirima sandaha ohuta atha hitha denne idam goda kirime ha sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawe sabhapathi roshan gunawardhana mahatha saha ema aayathanaye adhyaksha mandalayayi.

adatath lankawe supathala ma supiri ma hotalayakata wada, istharam ma ahara welaka rasa balannata sudanam wana wita, mage nasu pundu pura naga enne ara wattakka suwanda ya.....hitha pura, bada pura istharam ahara welak winda gudus arina wita, mata danenne ara gowa samaga mas hodde rasa ya...

mema wadasatahana osse, samajika ratawala pradhana sanwardhana aramunu sakshath kara ganuma udesa, manawa ha bhauthika sampath sanwardhanaya karanu labana athara, eya nyashtika thakshanaye samakami bhawitha anuwa yamin minisage saukhyaya ha poshanaya nanwalimatath, aahara ha krushikarma wyapruthiwalatath, jala sampath ha mulashra kalamanakaranayatath, parisarika ha karmantha kshethrawala abhiwruddhiyatath yoda ganima siduweyi.
